meta.description: Optimize the proportion of land used for two mining techniques to maximize daily production of rare earth oxide.

params.name: production_rate
params.description: Daily production of rare earth oxide per square mile for each technique.

params.name: wastewater_rate
params.description: Daily production of polluted wastewater per square mile for each technique.

params.name: machine_requirement
params.description: Number of extraction machines required per square mile for each technique.

params.name: total_land
params.description: Total available land in square miles.

params.name: max_wastewater
params.description: Maximum allowed daily production of polluted wastewater.

vars.name: land_use
vars.description: Proportion of land used for each mining technique.

objective.name: max_daily_production
objective.expr: sum(land_use[t] * production_rate[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
objective.description: Maximize the daily production of rare earth oxide.

constraints.name: land_constraint
constraints.description: Total land used cannot exceed available land.

constraints.name: machine_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(land_use[t] * machine_requirement[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
constraints.description: Total machines used cannot exceed available machines.

constraints.name: wastewater_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(land_use[t] * wastewater_rate[t] for t in TECHNIQUES)
constraints.description: Total polluted wastewater produced cannot exceed the maximum allowed.
